description.value: You are adept at foiling creatures' special senses and cautious enough to safeguard against them at all times. Whenever you use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Avoid Notice], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak] actions, you are always considered to be taking precautions against special senses.
